glosses: to suffer from a skin disease
H6879.def: = state in which humans suffer from a condition that affects the skin, which probably covers diseases such as psoriasis, favus, leucoderma; ► a person who suffers from this disease is considered ritually unclean, and therefore unable to participate in worship; ≈ regarded as infectious, and seen as a curse and a punishment from God

H6322.def: = man, to be identified with {L:Tiglath-Pileser<SDBH:תִּגְלַת פִּלְאֶסֶר>} III; ► king of {L:Assyria<SDBH:אַשּׁוּר>}, contemporary of {L:Ahaz<SDBH:אָחָז>} king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}, who attacked the northern kingdom of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during the reign of {L:Menahem<SDBH:מְנַחֵם>}, and exiled part of the population during the reign of king {L:Pekah<SDBH:פֶּקַח>}

H505.def: = generic term for domesticated oxen, both male and female; ► kept for milk and used for plowing

H3701.def: = silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4467.def: = state in which a person or deity has been entrusted with the office of {L:king<SDBH:מֶלֶךְ>} or {L:queen<SDBH:מַלְכָּה>}

H6943.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Naphtali<SDBH:נַפְתָּלִי>}; ► assigned to clan of {L:Gershon<SDBH:גֵּרְשֹׁון>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>} as town of refuge; later captured by {L:Tiglath-Pileser<SDBH:תִּגְלַת פִּלְאֶסֶר>}

H1540.def: = action by which someone takes off his/her clothes, either entirely or in part, ► as a result of which that person becomes naked or improperly dressed, ≈ which is considered a shameful thing to do

291.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H1954.def: = man, also known as {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his original name was Hoshea, which was later changed by Moses to Joshua; he was Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H425.def: = terebinth; tree with a broad crown, heavy branches, and thick trunk; may reach a height of 7.5 to 9 m.; sheds its leaves; has small an inconspicuous flowers; ◄ pictacia terebinthus; ► its stem contains aromatic turpentine, a resinous juice, which flows out when the bark is cut; it provides pleasant shade; ≈ imposing tree, preferred place to sit under and enjoy the shade, associated with cultic worship

H7194.def: = process by which separate objects being joined together to form one unit

H7195.def: = action by which humans devise a plan concerning other humans ► with the intention to harm that person
